contents: Article 17 (Provision of Information) ① The Sports Council posts the basic information of registered referees, player and coach experience, referee experience, education completion experience, rewards and punishments, etc. on the Sports Council website in accordance with the Act on Disclosure of Information by Public Institutions and the Sports Council regulations. and may be disclosed through the sports information system or provided to those who request the information. ② Issuance of referee activity results follows separate guidelines. [Title revised 2019. 11. 7.]
